column2: SELECT A.UIIID,stdev(ABS(A.petroMag_uSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_u)   +ABS(A.petroMag_gSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_g)   +ABS(A.petroMag_rSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_r)   +ABS(A.petroMag_iSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_i)   +ABS(A.petroMag_zSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_z)) FROM (     SELECT TOP(#) A.UIIID     FROM        MyDB.CasjobsCombinedOutputBrief AS A, SpecPhotoAll AS B        LEFT JOIN SpecObj as C ON B.specObjID=C.specObjID     WHERE           A.petroMag_uSDSSDR1#!=&&&       AND B.class!=&&&     ORDER BY        ABS(A.petroMag_uSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_u)      +ABS(A.petroMag_gSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_g)      +ABS(A.petroMag_rSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_r)      +ABS(A.petroMag_iSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_i)      +ABS(A.petroMag_zSDSSDR1#-B.petroMag_z)      ) AS T INTO    MyDB.CasjobsCombinedOutputBrief_SpecPhotoAll_MagSpace
